languages.text: "Сестричка одержима своими собственными голосами, что шепчут ей о скверне и ереси". {n}Идира молчит, а потом изменившимся голосом добавляет.{/n} "Глупышка не понимает, что начинать искать, откуда сквозит, надо со своей головы".

traits.locale_text: "Сестричка одержима своими собственными голосами, что шепчут ей о скверне и ереси". {n}Идира молчит, а потом изменившимся голосом добавляет.{/n} "Глупышка не понимает, что начинать искать, откуда сквозит, надо со своей головы".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."
languages.original_text: "Сестричка одержима своими собственными голосами, что шепчут ей о скверне и ереси". {n}Идира молчит, а потом изменившимся голосом добавляет.{/n} "Глупышка не понимает, что начинать искать, откуда сквозит, надо со своей головы".

traits.locale_text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “那个小修女总是被她自己那些声音折磨着，那些声音在对她低声诉说着关于腐化与异端分子的事情。”{n}伊迪拉沉默半晌，之后用另一种音调补充道。{/n}“那个愚蠢的女孩并没有意识到，如果她打算找到源头，她应该从自己的脑海中开始寻找。”
languages.original_text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."

traits.locale_text: “那个小修女总是被她自己那些声音折磨着，那些声音在对她低声诉说着关于腐化与异端分子的事情。”{n}伊迪拉沉默半晌，之后用另一种音调补充道。{/n}“那个愚蠢的女孩并没有意识到，如果她打算找到源头，她应该从自己的脑海中开始寻找。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."

languages.text: «La pequeña hermana sufre el acoso de sus propias voces, unas que susurran sobre la corrupción y la herejía». {n}Idira se queda en silencio antes de añadir con otro tono:{/n} «La muy tonta no se da cuenta de que, para encontrar su origen, el primer paso es buscar en su propia cabeza».
languages.original_text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."

traits.locale_text: «La pequeña hermana sufre el acoso de sus propias voces, unas que susurran sobre la corrupción y la herejía». {n}Idira se queda en silencio antes de añadir con otro tono:{/n} «La muy tonta no se da cuenta de que, para encontrar su origen, el primer paso es buscar en su propia cabeza».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女は自分自身の声に悩まされている。堕落や異端についてささやく声に」{n}イディラは黙り込み、別の声でこう付け加えた。{/n}「愚かな少女は、その原因を見つけるには、自分の頭の中を探すことから始めなければならないことに気づいていないのよ」
languages.original_text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は自分自身の声に悩まされている。堕落や異端についてささやく声に」{n}イディラは黙り込み、別の声でこう付け加えた。{/n}「愚かな少女は、その原因を見つけるには、自分の頭の中を探すことから始めなければならないことに気づいていないのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Die kleine Schwester wird von eigenen Stimmen geplagt. Stimmen, die ihr flüsternd von Verderbtheit und Ketzerei berichten." {n}Idira verstummt und fügt dann in anderem Tonfall hinzu: {/n}"Das dumme Mädchen begreift nicht, dass sie in ihrem eigenen Kopf beginnen muss, wenn sie die Quelle finden will."
languages.original_text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."

traits.locale_text: "Die kleine Schwester wird von eigenen Stimmen geplagt. Stimmen, die ihr flüsternd von Verderbtheit und Ketzerei berichten." {n}Idira verstummt und fügt dann in anderem Tonfall hinzu: {/n}"Das dumme Mädchen begreift nicht, dass sie in ihrem eigenen Kopf beginnen muss, wenn sie die Quelle finden will."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « La petite sœur est tourmentée par ses propres voix qui lui parlent de corruption et d'hérésie. » {n}Idira se tait pendant quelques instants, puis poursuit sur un ton différent :{/n} « Cette idiote ne se rend pas compte que si elle veut trouver la source, il faut d'abord qu'elle cherche dans sa propre tête. »
languages.original_text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."

traits.locale_text: « La petite sœur est tourmentée par ses propres voix qui lui parlent de corruption et d'hérésie. » {n}Idira se tait pendant quelques instants, puis poursuit sur un ton différent :{/n} « Cette idiote ne se rend pas compte que si elle veut trouver la source, il faut d'abord qu'elle cherche dans sa propre tête. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Küçük rahibenin de başına bela olan sesleri var. Kulağına yozlaşma ve kâfirlik fısıldıyorlar." {n}İdira susuyor, ardından farklı bir ses tonuyla devam ediyor.{/n} "Aptal kız, kaynağı bulması için evvela kendi zihnine bakması gerektiğinden bihaber."
languages.original_text: "The little sister is afflicted with her own set of voices, ones that whisper to her about corruption and heresy." {n}Idira falls silent, and then in a different voice adds,{/n} "The silly girl doesn't realise that if she wants to find the source, she needs to start by looking in her own head."

traits.locale_text: "Küçük kardeşimin de başına bela olan sesleri var. Kulağına yozlaşma ve kâfirlik fısıldıyorlar." {n}İdira susuyor. Ardından farklı bir sesle devam ediyor.{/n} "Ahmak kız. Kaynağı bulmaya o kadar meraklıysa kendi zihnini incelemeye bir an önce başlaması gerektiğinin farkında değil."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
